Original: The client is Mr. Donbre, a gourmand
who lives in the city. He wants a
[Color:5][Number:0][Color:0] from the [Color:5]Golden Lair[Color:0].
[Page]
This mushroom is inky black and
thrives from the earth's heat.
[Page]
It grows in the labyrinth and literally
feeds off of fire to grow twice its
usual size.
[Page]
There should be something in the
Golden Lair that releases fire that
you could use...
[Page]
The request only calls for one
mushroom, but the reward will be
adjusted for the amount you deliver.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: The client is Mr. Donbre, a gourmand
who lives in the city. He wants a
[Color:5][Number:0][Color:0] from the [Color:5]Golden Lair[Color:0].
[Page]
This mushroom is inky black and
thrives from the earth's heat.
[Page]
It grows in the labyrinth and literally
feeds off of fire to grow twice its
usual size.
[Page]
There should be something in the
Golden Lair that releases fire that
you could use...
[Page]
The request only calls for one
mushroom, but the reward will be
adjusted for the amount you deliver.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. I see you have safely
retrieved a [Number:0] from the
caverns.
[Page]
It looks burnt to me... and not very
appetizing...
[Page]
Though when one dines with gourmands,
one is expected to keep an open mind.
But I still prefer Dalla's dishes...
[Page]
Well, I again thank you for your hard
work. I'm counting on you to maintain
that standard with our other requests.
Translation: Welcome back. I see you have safely
retrieved a [Number:0] from the
caverns.
[Page]
It looks burnt to me... and not very
appetizing...
[Page]
Though when one dines with gourmands,
one is expected to keep an open mind.
But I still prefer Dalla's dishes...
[Page]
Well, I again thank you for your hard
work. I'm counting on you to maintain
that standard with our other requests.

Original: Welcome back. I take it you managed
to retrieve a [Number:0] from the
caverns?
[Page]
Oh, you brought not one, but two!
Mr. Donbre will be very satisfied.
[Page]
They look burnt to me... and not very
appetizing...
[Page]
Though when one dines with gourmands,
one is expected to keep an open mind.
But I still prefer Dalla's dishes...
[Page]
Well, I again thank you for your hard
work. I'm counting on you to maintain
that standard with our other requests.
Translation: Welcome back. I take it you managed
to retrieve a [Number:0] from the
caverns?
[Page]
Oh, you brought not one, but two!
Mr. Donbre will be very satisfied.
[Page]
They look burnt to me... and not very
appetizing...
[Page]
Though when one dines with gourmands,
one is expected to keep an open mind.
But I still prefer Dalla's dishes...
[Page]
Well, I again thank you for your hard
work. I'm counting on you to maintain
that standard with our other requests.

Original: You break the flaming scale and study
the rock's surface. An inky black
mushroom is growing there.
[Page]
You recall taking a request to deliver
a mushroom... This must be the
[Color:5][Number:0][Color:0] in question.
[Page]
If you like, you may pick the mushroom
to complete the request.
Translation: You break the flaming scale and study
the rock's surface. An inky black
mushroom is growing there.
[Page]
You recall taking a request to deliver
a mushroom... This must be the
[Color:5][Number:0][Color:0] in question.
[Page]
If you like, you may pick the mushroom
to complete the request.

Original: [Color:5]Pick the mushroom?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Pick the mushroom?[Color:0]

Original: You pluck the mushroom from the rocky
surface and put it in your pack.
Translation: You pluck the mushroom from the rocky
surface and put it in your pack.

Original: You may go to the bar now to turn in
your report or search for another
mushroom.
[Page]
There was supposedly a reward for
more than one mushroom... You wonder
where else you might find one.
Translation: You may go to the bar now to turn in
your report or search for another
mushroom.
[Page]
There was supposedly a reward for
more than one mushroom... You wonder
where else you might find one.

Original: You pick a second mushroom from the
rocky surface and put it in your pack.
Translation: You pick a second mushroom from the
rocky surface and put it in your pack.

Original: With two mushrooms in hand, the client
will be very pleased. You need only
deliver them to the bar now.
Translation: With two mushrooms in hand, the client
will be very pleased. You need only
deliver them to the bar now.

Original: You decide not to take this mushroom
and leave the area instead.
Translation: You decide not to take this mushroom
and leave the area instead.

Original: You have already picked the mushroom
that grew there...
Translation: You have already picked the mushroom
that grew there...
